name: Yash Goyal
position: Building Krvvy - India's first functional lingerie brand
about: Building Krvvy - India's first premium lingerie brand.

current_company.name: Krvvy
current_company.title: Building Krvvy - India's first functional lingerie brand

experience.title: Founder
experience.description: Creating new-age lingerie products that follow the path of comfortable fabric, proper fit, and high functionality. Our brand revolves around three core values: Comfort (Fabric, Fit, Functionality)Inclusivity (Size, Colour, Race)Sensitivity (Respecting Bodies and Boundaries)We aim to educate, assist, and sell to Indian women and create funnels through community engagement, problem solving metrics and continuous customer experience.We are bringing premium products at an Indian affordable pricing to Indian women, for Indian women.
experience.description_html: Creating new-age lingerie products that follow the path of comfortable fabric, proper fit, and high functionality. projects: [{"title":"DRISHTI","start_date":"Jan 2017","end_date":"Nov 2017","description":"Braille is an essential system of learning for visually challenged people. The aim of this project is to create a system that would utilize the haptic memory of a visually impaired person and help them learn braille through our interactive model using Raspberry pi."}]
